question:
Some people say History is one of the most important school subjects. Other people think that, in today’s world subjects like Science and Technology are more important than History.

Discuss both these views and give your own opinion.
text: There are two various notions about History in school on behalf of the people. Many people argue that some subjects which are relevant to Science and Technology are more significant than History today, but others have a contrast notion about this issue. Personally, I have the opinion that both views should be given equal consideration.
